alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Decatur; Logan; Rawlins; Sheridan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 10 at 9:57PM CDT until April 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM MDT /10 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 003, 013, 014, 015, 027, 028, 079, 080, 253, AND 254... Humidity is now rising and winds have calmed. The RFW will be allowed to expire. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 003, 013, 014, 015, 027, 028, 079, 080, 253, AND 254... * Affected Area...In Colorado...Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson and Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne...Fire Weather Zone 002 Rawlins... Fire Weather Zone 003 Decatur...Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman... Fire Weather Zone 014 Thomas...Fire Weather Zone 015 Sheridan... Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace and Fire Weather Zone 028 Logan. In Nebraska...Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy and Fire Weather Zone 080 Hitchcock. * Timing...On Tuesday 11 AM MDT through7 PMMDT. * Winds...Southwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph Tuesday * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Temperatures...In the middle 70s to middle 80s Tuesday. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised. An abrupt wind shift to the northwest is expected late Tuesday afternoon as a cold front moves through.
info.instruction: Avoid creating sparks. Take notice of any local burn bans.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne; Decatur; Logan; Rawlins; Sheridan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace
